cast.original_title: To All the Boys: Always and Forever
cast.overview: Senior year of high school takes center stage as Lara Jean returns from a family trip to Korea and considers her college plans — with and without Peter.
cast.title: To All the Boys: Always and Forever

details.biography: Jerry Yang is an actor known for the To All the Boys I've Loved Before series (2020/2021) , Upload (2020), and The Now (2021). Jerry has studied in New York, where he got his BFA in Acting for Film and TV at Pace University, and studied improv at Upright Citizens Brigade. His influences span from Gustav Klimt, to Amy Winehouse, to Bob the Drag Queen.
details.name: Jerry Yang
